value.title: Filter top 3 products with a row for others using DAX in Power BI
value.excerpt: This video shows an optimized DAX technique to display the first N products for each category in Power BI, adding a row that aggregates the value for all the other products. value.title: Using the SELECTEDVALUE function in DAX
value.excerpt: Learn how the SELECTEDVALUE DAX function simplifies the syntax required in many scenarios where you need to read a single value selected in the filter context.
